phrasesAndGrammars.phrase: Everyone was talking at the top of their lungs.
phrasesAndGrammars.note: Everyone is treated as singular, but lung becomes plural as in their lungs.
write a diary is a correct English expression
Not year and half, we need an article in both
Not a long game, the long game, meaning following a long-term strategy
To do something without special preparation
If I can give my two cents, ... Same as give my two cents' worth

phrasesAndGrammars.phrase: These letters are a great source of comfort.
phrasesAndGrammars.note: a great source of is a collective and can use with plural verb.
